game_description: Throw paper balls in a bin. Play by yourself in single player mode or play World Rank mode where your points are compared to everyone else's globally. Can play with either right or left hand. Bin moves around as you get more paper balls in the bin. If the player would like to have their name and high score deleted, please contact us. The steps in order to do this can be found here: https://krishgames.wordpress.com/privacy-policy/
review_1: First, thank you developers for this game, please continue to improve the game play , Can I able to see my two hands to play the game if possible. This is a simple game but it can get better too. Because I missed the basket too many time. Please continue to improve the game play .
review_2: Poor graphics, erratic physics and not fun to play. Nothing like the Paper Toss game that so many of us have enjoyed on our iPhones. This will require a great geal more development before itâ€™s worth the dollar it now costs.
review_3: The World Rank mode allows you to compare your score with everyone else's globally!
